title: What is the total number of government medical seats available for the CBSE students of Tamil Nadu? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Below please find list of Government Medical Colleges in Tamil Nadu along with the number of seats: Chengalpattu Medical College, Chengalpattu - 150 seatsCoimbatore Medical College, Coimbatore - 150 seatsESI-PGIMSR,ESI Hospital,K.K Nagar,Chennai - 100 seatsGovernment Dharmapuri Medical College, Dharmapuri - 100 seatsGovernment Medical College & ESIC Hospital, Coimbatore, TamilNadu - 100 seatsGovernment Medical College, Omandura - 100 seatsGovernment Medical College, Pudukottai, Tamil Nadu - 150 seatsGovernment Sivagangai Medical College, Sivaganga - 100 seatsGovernment Thiruvannamalai Medical College, Thiruvannamalai - 100 seatsGovernment Vellore Medical College, Vellore - 100 seatsGovernment Villupuram Medical College, Villupura - 100 seatsIRT Perundurai Medical College, Perundur - 100 seatsKanyaKumari Government Medical College, Asaripallam - 100 seatsK A P Viswanathan Government Medical College, Trichy - 150 seatsKilpauk Medical College, Chennai - 150 seatsMadras Medical College, Chenna - 250 seatsMadurai Medical College, Madurai - 150 seatsMohan Kumaramangalam Medical College, Salem - 100 seatsRajah Muthiah Medical College, Annamalainagar - 150 seatsStanley Medical College, Chennai - 250 seatsThanjavur Medical College,Thanjavur - 150 seatsTheni Government Medical College,Theni - 100 seatsThiruvarur Govt. Medical College, Thiruvarur - 100 seatsThoothukudi Medical College, Thoothukudi - 150 seatsTirunelveli Medical College,Tirunelveli - 150 seatsTotal Government MBBS seats = 3,300 85% are reserved for Tamil Nadu Board.
15% of 2200 ie,300–380 seats Bc-30% 114 sc-18% -68 st-12%-45 and other seats for open category and sport,ex servicemen,physically handicapped.
